tool_description: Generates foreign key constraints based on relationships between entities and validates referential integrity.

relationship_id.description: Relationship identifier to generate foreign keys for

referential_actions.description: Actions for UPDATE and DELETE (CASCADE, SET_NULL, RESTRICT, NO_ACTION)

error_messages: Relationship not found: The specified relationship_id does not exist.
Invalid referential action: Actions must be from [CASCADE, SET_NULL, RESTRICT, NO_ACTION].
Incorrect action count: Exactly two actions required: [UPDATE_action, DELETE_action].
Primary key missing: Referenced entity must have a primary key defined.
Data type mismatch: Foreign key attributes must match referenced primary key data types.
usage: Provide relationship_id to generate foreign key constraints. Optionally specify referential_actions array with UPDATE and DELETE actions.

foreign_keys_created.description: Number of foreign key constraints created

foreign_key_details.description: Details of each foreign key constraint created
